summary: A retrospective look at the "Best Hip Hop Radio Show of All-Time".
cast: Anthony Alonso|Stretch Armstrong|B-Real|Janet Balis|Common|Crazy Legs|X-Men Crew|Rosario Dawson|Jewlz the Director|DJ Premier|DMX|Marc Ecko|El-P|Eminem|Lord Finesse|Craig G|Bobbito Garcia|Ramona Garcia|Jean Grae|Tyesh Harris|Lauryn Hill|Jay-Z|Fat Joe|KRS-One|Talib Kweli|Matty C|Method Man|Pharoahe Monch|Nas|O.C.|Rosie Perez|A. title: Stretch and Bobbito: Radio That Changed Lives
